```{=html}
<iframe id="map-iframe" src="urbanform/index.html" class="urbanform-iframe"></iframe>
<script>
(function() {
  function positionIframe() {
    var navbar = document.getElementById('quarto-header');
    var iframe = document.getElementById('map-iframe');
    if (navbar && iframe) {
      var navbarHeight = navbar.offsetHeight;
      iframe.style.top = navbarHeight + 'px';
      iframe.style.height = 'calc(100vh - ' + navbarHeight + 'px)';
    }
  }

  // Run immediately
  positionIframe();

  // Run when DOM is ready
  if (document.readyState === 'loading') {
    document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', positionIframe);
  }

  // Run on window load (after all resources)
  window.addEventListener('load', positionIframe);

  // Run on resize
  window.addEventListener('resize', positionIframe);
})();
</script>
```
